New Records: Sanju Samson racked up the second-fastest hundred by an Indian in T20Is, scoring 111 runs off 47 balls.
Key Match Events: India beat Bangladesh by 133 runs in Hyderabad.
Sanju Samson scored 111 runs off 47 balls with 11 fours and eight sixes.
Samson was involved in a partnership of 173 runs for the second wicket with Suryakumar Yadav.
Ravi Bishnoi was the pick of the bowlers for India with figures of 4-1-30-3.
Mayank Yadav impressed with two wickets to his name.
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav revealed a strong message from Gautam Gambhir before the series started, emphasizing that no one is bigger than the team.
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav praised Sanju Samson for playing a selfless knock.
Suryakumar Yadav talked about the importance of players needing to be flexible to build more options in the line-up.
